thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 7 of 275
thread.title: Carlos

author: Carlos
title: Carlos
text: I find that this company buys back more books from my books than all the other companies combined, and while at times they may not offer the highest price on a buyback book, on average their buyback prices are the best. These two facts combined make it much easier to reach the threshold of making a minimum sales order. Unlike one competitor, (textbookrush), when you add a book to your sell back list, sellbackyourbook will guarantee the price and the buyback for a reasonable period of time. This is extremely helpful when it takes a few days to gather all of the materials to complete an order.
